haberman.rhizomatics.map

Class Overlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • haberman.rhizomatics.map.Overlay
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OverlayCircle, OverlayPolygon

    public class Overlay
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the root polygon which describes every markers within Rhizomatics. Computing a given amount of peels, this class becomes capable of animation. It's a solution I've found for polygons' animation, since we can't do it in mapbox (can't use AnimatedVectorDrawable, can't extend the final Polygon)...
    See Also:
    git issue #247

      • ALPHAS

        final float[] ALPHAS
        An array of float to be applied to the list of PolyDrawer. Index 0 is for the polygon, index 1 is for the polyline.
